directions: Melt butter with olive oil and thyme in a pot over medium-low heat. Cook and stir onions in butter mixture until caramelized, about 20 minutes.
Pour chicken broth and apple cider into pot; simmer mixture for 20 minutes. Garnish with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste (optional)
title: Fall Onion Soup
